description: This table contains details regarding the resolution of claim codes for AP claims.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the accounts payable claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EOB_CODE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the code that has been resolved from the claim.

columns.name: RESOLUTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category identifier for the resolution specified when resolving the code.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Paid by Other Insurance


Referral Found


No Referral


Change Approved


Change Denied


Superfluous Claim - Not Processed


Previous Claim Erroneous - Use Current Claim


Cleared


Third-party Pricing Completed

columns.name: ENTRY_DATE
columns.description: The date the resolved code was added to the claim.

columns.name: ENTRY_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the user who added the resolved code to the claim.

columns.name: RESOLUTION_DATE
columns.description: The date (without the time) the code was resolved from the claim.

columns.name: RESOLUTION_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the user who resolved the claim code.

columns.name: RESOLUTION_COMMENT
columns.description: The comment specified when the code was added to the claim.

columns.name: RSLVD_EOB_CODE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the code that has been resolved from the claim. This column is equivalent to EOB_CODE_ID.

columns.name: RSLVD_EOB_DATETIME
columns.description: The date and time when the code was added to the claim.

columns.name: RESOLUTION_DATETIME
columns.description: The date and time when the code was resolved.
